channel.title: NPC (Hans) issue
channel.description: Hi im trying to edit what an npc says (autotalk) so i change it,but when i compile and log on it doesnt work... and i also tried to change him from Hans(0) to Death (2862) and still it doesnt show when i log on. Also its not me or my compiler because i have coded other things in the past and they work.... if anyone could help me it would be greatly Appreciated. ,Monoxide (Phantomscape) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2008, 12:13:38 AM[/size][hr]UPDATE: If someone helps i will give them a hug VIA E-mail

item.title: NPC (Hans) issue
item.dc:creator: @Monoxide Monoxide
item.description:
@Monoxide wrote:

Hi im trying to edit what an npc says (autotalk) so i change it,but when i compile and log on it doesnt work… and i also tried to change him from Hans(0) to Death (2862) and still it doesnt show when i log on. Also its not me or my compiler because i have coded other things in the past and they work… if anyone could help me it would be greatly Appreciated.
,Monoxide (Phantomscape)
